title.rendered: How young is too young for plastic surgery? Dr. Pearlman speaks to USA Today about Bella Hadid’s Rhinoplasty

content.rendered:
Dr. Pearlman, dual Board Certified Facial Plastic Surgeon, speaks with USA today about the risks and benefits of teenage rhinoplasty following Bella Hadid’s disclosure of the rhinoplasty she had at 14 years old.

Read Full Article

Teenage Rhinoplasty

Deciding to undergo a rhinoplasty as a teenager is a big decision.  Rhinoplasty can be beneficial for teenagers that are being bullied in school, or lack self-esteem. A teenage rhinoplasty can improve the appearance of the nose often leading to emotional and psychological empowerment that outweighs the physical changes.

 

VISIT OUR RENOWNED NEW YORK CITY PRACTICE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT Teenage rhinoplasty NEAR YOU AT PEARLMAN AESTHETIC SURGERY

For decades, Dr. Pearlman has been persistent in his search for perfection as the best rhinoplasty surgeon in New York. He brings evolution, experience, expertise, and uniqueness to his rhinoplasty patients in our Park Avenue office. Start a discussion with our team if you and your teen are considering teenage rhinoplasty.

schedule a consult
